body_html:
@ailzhang When I try to follow the steps on the link you provided, there was no file call log_num_mtt, while log_mtts_per_seg shows '3'.

recompile with WITH_GLOO_IBVERBS=0 works, will update again once the benchmark is done. But still hope it can work on IB to see whether there are any bottleneck issue on ethernet.
body_text:
@ailzhang When I try to follow the steps on the link you provided, there was no file call log_num_mtt, while log_mtts_per_seg shows '3'.

body:
@ailzhang When I try to follow the steps on the link you provided, there was no file call log_num_mtt, while log_mtts_per_seg shows '3'.

recompile with WITH_GLOO_IBVERBS=0 works, will update again once the benchmark is done. But still hope it can work on IB to see whether there are any bottleneck issue on ethernet.
